description: Built for skiers looking for race-like speed and confidence no matter the conditions, Salomon's S/Race eSKIN ski set is perfect for races and all-day events. Delivered in pack, just slide the light and performant Shift Race binding on the plate to optimize your grip and glide. <br><br>Master diagonal strides on all terrains with Classic equipment: Long, grippy Classic Skis for reliable traction. Flexible Boots for effective striding. Stable Bindings for controlled pivoting. Elevate your classic skiing journey!<br><br>Dominate the track with gear crafted for experts. Our racing skis combine speed and stability. Precision-engineered boots maximize power, while cutting-edge bindings ensure unmatched control. Elevate your performance with gear that meets the demands of expert cross-country skiing.<br><br>Enhance classic skiing with skin grip innovation. Mohair/synthetic skin in grip zone for excellent traction and glide. Reliable propulsion on any terrain and snow type. Embrace hassle-free, high-performance skiing.<br>
name: S/Race eSkin Hard + Prolink Shift Race - Set

specs.value: Parallel sidecut that helps skis track straight and fast
Developed in collaboration with our athletes, this extremely polyvalent grind provides you with the fastest glide available
The ski's base is digitally measured after grinding to ensure outmost precision and performance
The base is already pre-waxed and pre-brushed so you can enjoy the glide from your very first ski session
Our high-quality production process enables you to select the exact ski you need based on your bodyweight
Parallel sidecut that helps skis track straight and fast
Our latest classic racing concept is designed to amplify kick and acceleration. It offers ideal press adjustment, especially in universal snow conditions
Digital control of the molding press enables the generation of optimal flex and camber for specific performance on snow. D2FC ensures also perfect ski pairing
World Cup base delivering maximum performance in universal conditions
Ultra-light composite honeycomb core, combined with carbon, fiberglass wrap and thin wood sidewalls. Reduces weight and provides optimum consistency
100% MOHAIR skin with equal balance of grip and glide. You can switch it manually if you want to use the eSKINRACE to get into racing mode!
